sentences.en: A good dictionary is the handmaid of the linguist.
sentences.cn: 一部好字典封语言学家的帮助甚大.

sentences.en: Czech linguist Danes puts forward 5 types of TP model.
sentences.cn: 捷克语言学家Danes提出了五种主位推进模式.

sentences.en: He had a scholarly air and was an accomplished linguist.
sentences.cn: 他有一种学者的风度，而且是个熟练掌握多国语言的人。
他是一位杰出的语言学家.

sentences.en: He used to be a linguist till he turns writer.
sentences.cn: 他过去是个语言学家,后来成了作家.

sentences.en: He used to be a teacher till he turned writer ( linguist ).
sentences.cn: 他过去是教员,后来当了作家 ( 语言学家 ).

sentences.en: He was a gifted linguist and taught Latin and Greek.
sentences.cn: 他是一位天分极高的语言学家,教授拉丁文和希腊文.

sentences.en: Her brother was an accomplished linguist.
sentences.cn: 她的哥哥能熟练地说好几种语言。

sentences.en: I used to be a linguist till I become a writer.
sentences.cn: 过去我是个语言学家,后来成了作家.

sentences.en: I'm afraid I'm no linguist, ie I am poor at foreign languages.
Jespersen is considered a world - famous linguist.
sentences.cn: 叶斯柏森是公认的 世界级 语言学家.

sentences.en: Only philosophers would ever notice such things and perhaps the odd linguist.
sentences.cn: 只有哲学家才会去注意到诸如其类的事情,怪癖的语言学家可能也会.

sentences.en: Professor Cui has a high reputation as a linguist.
sentences.cn: 崔教授作为语言学家名声很高.

sentences.en: Sara : And by creating you mean fabricating, neural linguist programming, behavior. science.
sentences.cn: 编造故事你是指编织谎言, 这是神经语言学, 行为分析学.

sentences.en: The linguist is fluent in the queer dialect.
sentences.cn: 那位语言学家对于那个奇怪的方言很娴熟.

trans.tran_cn: 通晓数国语言的人，语言学家
trans.tran_en: someone who studies or teaches linguistics
